result.arabic_text: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
result.translation: Noah said, “My Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose wealth and children did not increase them except in loss[7].
result.footnotes: [7] i.e., the lowly people among them followed their wealthy chiefs.
